des:
To get started, please ensure you have the proper hardware and accessories. Please contact Smith & Noble Customer Service if you have any questions.

Smith & Noble Smart Shade merges seamlessly with Alexa to bring enhanced operation of popular Smith & Noble window coverings to your connected lifestyle.

Smart Shade works with Alexa to allow you to voice-activate individual shades, Rooms of shades, or specific Smart Shade Scenes created in the Smith & Noble 4.0 App.

Simply speak “Alexa" followed by the activation words "Activate", "Open", or "Close", and then the shade name, Room, or Smart Shade Scene name.

Some example phrases are:
Individual Shade Command Examples
"Alexa, Open Bedroom Left."
“Alexa, Set Kitchen Right tilt to 50 percent.”

Room Command Examples
"Alexa, Close Living Room."

Scene Command Examples
"Alexa, Activate 'I'm Leaving.'"
“Alexa, Run “Movie Night.”

Below are some tips for success when voice-activating Smith & Noble Smart Shades using the Smart Shade skill for Alexa:
- Make sure shade names, Rooms, and Scene names are unique
- Make your shade names, Rooms, and Scene names easy to pronounce
-Use Routines to combine multiple shades, Rooms of shades, or specific Smart Shade Scenes with other devices for whole-home automation

In order to use the Smart Shade skill for Alexa to voice-activate your Smith & Noble Smart Shades, you'll need the following:

Account Requirements: Smith & Noble Account with a Smith & Noble Gateway (account setup and Gateway setup in the Smith & Noble 4.0 app. This ensures seamless account linking with Alexa. 

For more information on Smith & Noble Smart Shade products visit: www.smithandnoble.com/motorized-products
